fetching_integrations.name: Cortex Xpanse

action.existing:
Update your current instance to work with the new Xpanse Alert Incident type: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident classifier field to Xpanse - Classifier. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'Xpanse - Incoming Mapper'.
action.new:
Set up new 'Cortex Xpanse' instance to start fetching Cortex Xpanse Alerts: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident classifier to Xpanse - Classifier. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'Xpanse - Incoming Mapper'.
